title: Heartfelt Gifts
details: Claim one free outfit each day, for a total of 3 outfits. The 4-star utfit [Radiant Night] can be claimed twice!

title: Carnival of Fireworks
details: Visit the Firework Isles and complete event-exclusive tasks and quests, including log-in rewards. The Fireworks Carriage, Whirl-a-Pony Ride, and Camp Kaboom are photo spots exclusive to the Firework Isles

subEvents.title: Go to the Firework Isles!
subEvents.details: An Event-Exclusive Quest Line that unlocks the Firework Isles permanently and gain access to other event exclusive activities and rewards.

subEvents.title: Drifting Whim
subEvents.details: Collect Whim Balloons in Firework Isles to unlock limited time rewards such as Diamonds, Glitter Bubbles, and Bling!

subEvents.title: Fireworks Styling Challenges
subEvents.details: New stylists have arrived in Firework Isles. Challenge them to collect Diamonds, Glitter Bubbles, and Threads of Purity!

title: New Bloom Festival
details: The White Jade has docked in Florawish! Help master musicians and play minigames to get limited time rewards! Exclusive Shop items have also been added during this festive season.

title: Star-Kissed Wishes
details: Participate in the Wish Festival! Complete [Go to the Dream Warehouse!] quest to unlock exclusive rewards and participate in many other limited-time activities during the New Year!

title: Heartfelt Gifts
details: Celebrate the official launch of Infinity Nikki and Nikki's birthday! Log in to claim an exclusive event outfit and other rewards!
